content.question: An isolated parallel-plate capacitor of capacitance <math alttext="C sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> has a charge of magnitude <math alttext="Q sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> on each of its plates. A dielectric material with dielectric constant <math alttext="kappa equals 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Îº</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math> is inserted into the capacitor, filling the entire space between the plates. What is the magnitude of the work done to insert the dielectric?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator Q sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 6 C sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msubsup><mi>Q</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mrow><mn>6</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator Q sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 3 C sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msubsup><mi>Q</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator Q sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 2 C sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msubsup><mi>Q</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 Q sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 3 C sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msubsup><mi>Q</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator Q sub 0, end sub, squared, and denominator 3 C sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msubsup><mi>Q</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>C</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>
